jobDescription: Top Daily Responsibilities: Partner with research leads and execute our weekly usability research program:Conduct weekly remote and/or in-person usability studies with developer users on UX flows.Liaise with cross-functional, geographically-distributed stakeholders (design, product, engineering) to plan and execute weekly rolling usability studies.Collect and analyze findings and provide recommendations.Debrief with stakeholders.Support participant recruitment.Communicate and archive weekly results. Required Skills: BA/BS degree in a related field.0-1 year experience in UX researchUnderstanding of user research methodologies, especially usability and task-based assessment.Well-working knowledge of the principles of experiment design.Excellent interpersonal, communication, presentation, negotiation, and collaboration skills.Some experience conducting research studies. Nice to have: Experience of the app lifecycle / previously built a web or native mobile app.Experience with remote usability testing tools such as Optimal Workshop, UserTesting.com or UserZoom.
